description: Upgrades one or more virtual machines to the latest SKU set in the VM scale set model.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

instanceids.description: The virtual machine scale set instance ids.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

vm_scale_set_name.description: The name of the VM scale set.

vm_instance_i_ds.description: A list of virtual machine instance IDs from the VM scale set.
